definition: abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)

sentences.english: As she talked she led him into the ICU.
sentences.chinese: 这样边说边走，就把他带进加护病房去了。

sentences.english: Mr. Thompson is resting in bed after returning from the recovery room.
sentences.chinese: 汤姆森先生从加护病房返回后正在床上休息。

sentences.english: The purpose of this project was to reduce the infection density of Acinetobacter Bauniannii in an ICU.
sentences.chinese: 本专案旨在降低加护中心鲍氏不动杆菌感染密度。

sentences.english: I found myself in a hospital in an intensive-care ward, recuperating from emergency surgery.
sentences.chinese: 我发现自己在医院的加护病房中，刚进行完紧急手术。

sentences.english: On Monday she was taken into ICU and on Wednesday she died.
sentences.chinese: 星期一她送进了医院，安置在加护病房。

sentences.english: On Monday she was taken to the hospital and placed in ICU.
sentences.chinese: 星期一她送进了医院，安置在加护病房。

definition: shield/(currency) Vietnamese dong/currency unit of several countries (Indonesian rupiah, Dutch gulden etc)
one who has mastered the sutras (Buddhism)
to fire/to discharge/to release (fireworks, smokescreen, poison gas, virus etc)
to implement the law/to perform sorcery
sb who sells one's blood for a living
